member.name: P:PX.Dashboards.DAC.Widget.IsMasterCopy
member.summary: True, if current user is a dashboard owner; false, if current user is not a dashboard owner, and user copy will be created after any changes in this widget.
member.remarks: For using inside a widget graph to determine whether to show user-specific settings.

member.name: T:PX.Dashboards.DashboardMaint.RecordInfo
member.summary: For per-request caching of IsPredefined() and IsCustomized() method results.
